USE gold_database
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateServerlessView_gold @ViewName NVARCHAR(100)
AS 
BEGIN

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)

    SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW' + @ViewName + 'AS
        SELECT *
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
                BULK ''https://adlsgen2project21.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/bicycleshema/' + @ViewName + '/'',
                FORMAT = ''DELTA''
            ) AS [result]
        '

EXEC (@statement)

END 
GO
